title: Public Tribunal Unleashed
outcome: Council, under immense pressure, launches a temporary 'Citizen Tribunal' broadcast citywide. Citizens bring evidence of wrongful BCI flagging and detainment. Powerful revelations temporarily destabilize the Council, but backlash shuts down the tribunal, plunging public trust to new lows.

events.description: Council launches high-profile 'Citizen Tribunal'—citizens anonymously submit complaints about wrongful BCI flagging and detainment, hearings broadcast citywide.
Evidence of systemic BCI abuse and fraud emerges during hearings, with several security officials and administrators demoted on live feed.
The Directorate claims the tribunal undermines systemic order, forcibly suspends further sessions, and orders immediate media blackout.
Disillusioned crowds mark the brief tribunal period with open-air gatherings, folk songs, and chalk messages, cementing its place as a symbol of fleeting transparency.
